implements AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
    A resubmission scheduler that schedules jobs with a fixed delay.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • WithFixedDelay

        public WithFixedDelay(ScheduledExecutorService scheduledExecutorService,
                      long time,
                      TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Creates a new resubmission scheduler with a fixed delay between job executions.
        参数:
        scheduledExecutorService - The executor service to schedule to.
        time - The time interval to pause between completed jobs.
        timeUnit - The time's time unit.

    • 方法详细资料

        从接口复制的说明: AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
        Checks if this scheduler is currently available.
        指定者:
        isAlive 在接口中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
        返回:
        true if this scheduler is alive.

      • schedule

        public AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.Cancelable schedule(Runnable job)
        从接口复制的说明: AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
        Schedules a resubmission job for regular application.
        指定者:
        schedule 在接口中 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
        参数:
        job - The job to schedule.
        返回:
        A cancelable that is canceled upon resetting the corresponding class file transformer.
